node.name: Learning Efficiancy
node.rich_text: 1. InfoSec field bohot bada hai ‚Äď aur isi wajah se log confuse ho jaate hain.

• Topics bohot saare hain: Networking, Linux, Web, Reverse Engineering, Malware, etc.
• Sab kuch
technical
hota hai, aur wo
zaroori bhi hai
‚Äď lekin samasya hai: ‚Üí
Itna sab kaise seekhen? Kaise handle karein? Kya pehle karein, kya baad mein?
2. Real problem: Information overload nahi, balki unhe structure karna hai.

◇ Jab tak hume ye clear nahi hota: ▪ Mujhe kya aata hai?
▪ Mujhe kya nahi aata?
▪ Mujhe kya chahiye?
Tab tak hume mile huye resources ka koi faida nahi hoga.
3. Seekhne ka best tareeka: Pehle Fail karo!
‚ÄúFailure is experience in disguise.‚ÄĚ

◇ Jaise ek student engine banana seekhna chahta hai.
◇ Agar wo sirf theory padhta rahe to use actual engine samajh nahi aayega.
◇ Jab tak
khud haath nahi lagayega
, jab tak
galtiyan nahi karega

, wo nahi seekh sakta.
◇ Jab instructor ke sath guidance milti hai + practical try karta hai ‚Üí
Tab real understanding hoti hai.
4. Academy ka aim hai ki:
◇ Tujhe sirf tools na sikhaye, balki: ▪
Seekhne ka tareeka sikhaye
Information structure karna sikhaye
Research karna sikhaye
Jo confusion hoti hai, uska overview banana sikhaye
To be ‚ÄúGood‚ÄĚ in InfoSec:

‚ÄúAchha hone ka matlab hai: Tu janta hai ki tu kya kar raha hai.‚ÄĚ ◇ Jise experience hota hai, wo confident hota hai.
◇ Experience aata hai:
practice + sochne ki aadat + association se.
Kitni practice chahiye? 10,000 hours ya 20 hours?

◇ Malcolm Gladwell ka ‚Äú10,000 Hour Rule‚ÄĚ kehta hai: Kisi bhi cheez mein master banne ke liye 10,000 hours chahiye.
◇ Lekin Josh Kaufman kehta hai: Kisi bhi naye skill ko
"achhe level"
tak le jaane ke liye sirf
20 hours
ki focused practice kaafi hai. (jaise 45 min/day ke hisaab se ~1 month)
Pareto Principle (80/20 Rule):
20% effort ‚Üí 80% results 80% effort ‚Üí baaki 20% perfection ◇ Ye rule batata hai ki
focus karke thoda effort bhi bohot kaam kar jaata hai.
◇ Smart learning >>> Hard learning.
Active vs Passive Learning (Learning Pyramid)
Tu jab cheezein seekhta hai, to uske
levels
hote hain.
Learning Pyramid
ek model hai jo batata hai ki kaunsa learning method kitna effective hota hai
Optional Exercise: Learning Pyramid ka overview banana hai
Yeh steps follow kar:
Step 1: Research karo ‚ÄúLearning Pyramid‚ÄĚ ke baare mein

Use Google ya trusted sites jaise: ◇ learningpyramid.org
◇ educational websites
◇ TED Talks
◇ Images search ‚Üí ‚ÄúLearning pyramid chart‚ÄĚ
Step 2: Overview banao
Chart jaisa overview banao (mai teri help kar sakti hoon bana ke):
Learning Pyramid ke Levels:
(Top ‚Üí Least effective | Bottom ‚Üí Most effective)
Step 3: Apna Research kaise kiya, wo likh

Jaise: ◇ Maine Google pe search kiya ‚ÄúLearning Pyramid explained‚ÄĚ
◇ Maine 3 alag sites padhi
◇ Fir maine ek table banaya jisme retention levels likhe
◇ Mujhe samajh aaya ki jab mai kisi ko sikhata hoon to mujhe khud bhi sabse zyada yaad rehta hai.
Summary:
Tujhe bohot zyada time nahi dena,
smartly aur consistently kaam karna hai
. Pehle fail kar, fir seekh. Jab tu khud kisi concept ko kisi aur ko samjha sake,
tab tu expert ban raha hai
